content.prompt: The style of Bibles moralisées from the thirteenth century was influential on the creation of other medieval manuscripts in part because the

choices.label: use of geometric forms made it easy to mass-produce the designs for a wide audience
detailed illustrations helped the illiterate to understand the teachings of Reformation theology
sumptuous materials such as gold leaf demonstrated the wealth and taste of the works’ patrons
small size made it easy for the devout to carry the books with them to and from mass
